text: Helcion pruinosus, common name the rayed limpet, is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Patellidae, one of the families of true limpets. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== Category:Patellidae Category:Gastropods described in 1848 Category:Taxa named by Christian Ferdinand Friedrich Krauss
title: Helcion pruinosus
